data.trans_hint: Công ty LG vừa mới ký hợp đồng cho thuê với bên hãng luật.
data.en_hint: LG Company has just signed a lease agreement with the law firm.
data.content_game_1: LG Company has just signed a lease agreement with the law firm.
data.answer_en_hint: LG Company has just signed a lease agreement with the law firm.

data.trans_hint: Hợp đồng xác định rõ các điều khoản bảo hành.
data.en_hint: The agreement specifies the terms of warranty.
data.content_game_1: The agreement specifies the terms of warranty.
data.answer_en_hint: The agreement specifies the terms of warranty.

data.trans_hint: Bạn cần phải làm rõ thông tin trong bản hợp đồng này.
data.en_hint: You need to clarify the information in this contract.
data.content_game_1: You need to clarify the information in this contract.
data.answer_en_hint: You need to clarify the information in this contract.

data.trans_hint: Hai bên đồng ý tuân theo quyết định của quan tòa.
data.en_hint: The two parties agreed to abide by the judge's decision.
data.content_game_1: The two parties agreed to abide by the judge's decision.
data.answer_en_hint: The two parties agreed to abide by the judge's decision.

data.trans_hint: Hãy cho tôi tất cả các chi tiết của hợp đồng mà họ đã gửi sáng nay.
data.en_hint: Give me all the details of the contract that they sent this morning.
data.content_game_1: Give me all the details of the contract that they sent this morning.
data.answer_en_hint: Give me all the details of the contract that they sent this morning.

data.trans_hint: Các hợp đồng nên được sắp xếp theo thứ tự bảng chữ cái.
data.en_hint: The contracts should be filed alphabetically.
data.content_game_1: The contracts should be filed alphabetically.
data.answer_en_hint: The contracts should be filed alphabetically.

data.trans_hint: Vui lòng điền vào hợp đồng bằng bút và nộp vào ngày mai kèm với chữ ký của bạn.
data.en_hint: Please fill out the contract in pen and submit it tomorrow with your signing.
data.content_game_1: Please fill out the contract in pen and submit it tomorrow with your signing.
data.answer_en_hint: Please fill out the contract in pen and submit it tomorrow with your signing.

data.trans_hint: Giống như các bên đi vay khác, chính quyền địa phương có nghĩa vụ theo hợp đồng là phải tuân theo các điều khoản về hoàn trả.
data.en_hint: Like any other borrowers, local authorities have a contractual obligation to comply with the terms of repayment.
data.content_game_1: Like any other borrowers, local authorities have a contractual obligation to comply with the terms of repayment.
data.answer_en_hint: Like any other borrowers, local authorities have a contractual obligation to comply with the terms of repayment.

data.trans_hint: Hợp đồng có thể bị chấm dứt bởi 1 trong 2 bên với một thông báo trước 3 tháng.
data.en_hint: The contract can be terminated by either party with three months' notice.
data.content_game_1: The contract can be terminated by either party with three months' notice.
data.answer_en_hint: The contract can be terminated by either party with three months' notice.

data.trans_hint: Nhà thầu bị ràng buộc bởi hợp đồng làm việc 40 giờ một tuần.
data.en_hint: The contractor was obligated by the contract to work 40 hours a week.
data.content_game_1: The contractor was obligated by the contract to work 40 hours a week.
data.answer_en_hint: The contractor was obligated by the contract to work 40 hours a week.
